use.flag: Enable manually-optimised routines using the AMD 3DNow!Ex SIMD instruction set, present in modern AMD CPUs. (Check for 3dnowext in /proc/cpuinfo to know whether your CPU supports it).
Enforces license compatibility constraints via REQUIRED_USE.
Enables runtime CPU detection (useful for bindist, compatibility on other CPUs)
Use pre-calculated tables rather than calculating them on the fly.
Force shared libraries to be built as PIC (this is slower)
Faster floating point optimization for SSSE3 capable chips (Intel Core 2 and later chips)
